ch.nolix.core.fileSystem

Class FolderAccessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.core.fileSystem.FileSystemItemAccessor
      • ch.nolix.core.fileSystem.FolderAccessor

  • public final class FolderAccessor
extends FileSystemItemAccessor
    A folder accessor can access a given folder.
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FolderAccessor(java.lang.String folderPath)
      Creates a new folder accessor for the folder with the given folder path.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FileAccessor createFile(java.lang.String relativeFilePath)
      Creates a new empty file with the given relative path in the folder of this folder accessor.
      FolderAccessor createFolder(java.lang.String relativeFolderPath)
      Creates a new empty folder with the given relative path in the folder of this folder accessor.
      void deleteFileSystemItem(java.lang.String relativePath)
      Deletes the file system item with the given relative path from the folder of this folder accessor if it exists.
      void openInFileExplorer()
      Opens the folder of this folder accessor in a new file explorer.

      • Methods inherited from class ch.nolix.core.fileSystem.FileSystemItemAccessor

        getParentFolderAccessor, getPath, getSizeInBytes, isFile, isFolder, openParentFolder

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • FolderAccessor

        public FolderAccessor(java.lang.String folderPath)
        Creates a new folder accessor for the folder with the given folder path.
        Parameters:
        folderPath -
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException - if there exists no folder with the given folder path in the file system on the local machine.

    • Method Detail

      • createFile

        public FileAccessor createFile(java.lang.String relativeFilePath)
        Creates a new empty file with the given relative path in the folder of this folder accessor.
        Parameters:
        relativeFilePath -
        Returns:
        new file accessor to the created file.
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException - if a file system item with the given relative file path exists in the folder of this folder accessor.
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if an error occurs.

      • createFolder

        public FolderAccessor createFolder(java.lang.String relativeFolderPath)
        Creates a new empty folder with the given relative path in the folder of this folder accessor.
        Parameters:
        relativeFolderPath -
        Returns:
        new folder accessor to the created folder.
        Throws:
        InvalidArgumentException - if a file system item with the given relative file path exists in the folder of this folder accessor.
